name: Field Description
description: Component for form field description text that provides helpful context and instructions to users about how to fill out form fields.

allow_html.description: Whether to allow HTML in text.

examples.name: Large Field Description
examples.description: Larger field description for more prominent information

props.content: This is a larger field description with more prominent styling.

when_to_use: Provide helpful context about what users should enter in a form field
Give examples of proper formatting (e.g., phone numbers, dates)
Explain requirements or constraints for field input
Clarify the purpose or usage of less obvious form fields
when_not_to_use: For error messages - use field-message component instead
For required field indicators - use label component with is_required
For general form instructions that apply to multiple fields
best_practices: Use plain language that users can easily understand
Place descriptions close to their related form fields
Be consistent in tone and style across all field descriptions
Use the appropriate size - regular for most cases, large for critical information

accessibility.notes: This component is accessible when properly associated with form fields.

variations: Regular size: Standard descriptive text for most form fields
Large size: More prominent descriptions for important or complex fields
